entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Different implementations of `GenerateRadioButton()` and `GenerateCheckBox()` in `DefaultHtmlGenerator.cs` #46535
  • Perf regression: https #46534
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #46533
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Problem with conuming blazor server custom element through another webApp! #46531
  • String array queries do not use commas to separate each element #46530
  • Set dynamically @page #46529
  • Limitation with using Multiple Cookie Authentications #46528
  • Certain HTTP/2 requests failing with a 504 when going through an F5 BIG-IP device #46527
  • Would be nice if Virtualized blazor component keeps a head and a tail of objects #46526
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #46525
  • DOTNET_ROOT while running tests #46524
  • within wasm, we need js idl binding library. #46520

Closed

  • When the 'no-cache' Response Caching Header set, 'max-age' still required. #42705
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode not resolved from generator #46510
    8.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-web-frameworks
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Add HTTP/3 test to verify platform support #46523
    area-runtime
  • No constraints #46522
    area-runtime
  • Refactor named pipes connection listener completion #46521
    area-runtime
  • Reduce allocations caused by Range operators on arrays and strings #46519
  • Remove incorrect/unnecessary trimming suppressions. #46518

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary code from F# templates #46443
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Add comment to gRPC template tests SkipOnAlpine attribute #46517
    area-mvc, area-grpc, 8.0-preview2
  • Update Debian11 Arm64 queue to Debian12 #46419
    8.0-preview2
  • Update milestone for servicing PRs #46514
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Use HashCode helper class instead of package #46513
    8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Continuation of PR 40097 (Input components should use SetUpdatesAttributeName) #46434
    area-blazor
  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime
